item.title: Darlene Love - Christmas - Key of D - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Christmas by Darlene Love from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: A7, Bm, D, F♯m, G.

item.description: Play along video for the song Rockin' Around The Christmas Tree by Brenda Lee from the channel Cynthia Lin Music. Chords used in the song: A7, Bm7, C, D, Em, G.

item.title: Mele Kalikimaka - Fun, Easy Ukulele Play-Along! Cynthia Lin & Ben Ahn - Key of C - Cynthia Lin Music
Steven Curtis Chapman - I Want a Ukulele for Christmas - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song I Want a Ukulele for Christmas by Steven Curtis Chapman from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: Am7, C, Cm, Cm6, C♯dim, D7, D7sus4, Dmaj7, E7, Em, Em6, G, G7, Gaug, Gmaj7.
